backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, quizzes, articles, and blob storage with authorization checks and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by introducing a persistent article store while preserving existing maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing a frontend change related to article display reliability with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including styles, components, hooks, quiz logic, and infrastructure utilities.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment configuration showing translation API options and backend canister ID setup for build-time or runtime usage.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme defining cyber-bunker OKLCH color variables, dark mode, base styles, and safe-area inset support.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point with enforced dark mode and pre-bootstrap script loading runtime env.json before React initializes.
frontend/public/env.json: Runtime environment file containing a placeholder backend canister ID.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application managing authentication, view routing, diagnostics, quiz flow, and study article navigation.
frontend/src/components/AdminStatusPanel: Empty placeholder component file for an admin status panel.
frontend/src/components/AdminTokenReauth: Empty placeholder component file for an admin token reauthentication dialog.
frontend/src/components/AppHeaderBrand.t: Brand header component displaying app title and metadata with a themed icon.
frontend/src/components/BuildIdentityFoo: Footer component showing build version, timestamp, and deployment ID for diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentDiagno: Diagnostics panel running health checks, environment checks, error reporting, and providing sharing and publishing tools.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with reactive UI states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form allowing users to submit their name and save it to the backend.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Creates configured backend actors, resolves canister IDs, and initializes agents for local or production use.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Translation utility calling a configurable API to translate text between languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Provides backup and restore functions using actor state export/import with validation and UI status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportAllQuestions: Exports all quizzes’ questions and block names using the backend actor with error reporting.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerateArticle.ts: Generates an article from a question via the backend actor and validates the returned content.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, clearing identity, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingUpdate.ts: Detects when a new build is available by comparing stored and current build IDs and exposes a flag and method to mark the update as seen.
frontend/src/hooks/usePressHold.ts: Implements press-and-hold detection using pointer and keyboard events, returning pressed state and event handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, quizzes, question data, and counts via an actor API with diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Provides translation utilities with caching, deduped requests, error handling, and translation state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Adds functionality to copy all questions from one quiz to another with error handling and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports global theme styles from the root index.css file.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive question scheduler with first‑pass randomization, spaced repeats, and mastery tracking.
frontend/src/quiz/BackupRestorePanel.tsx: UI panel enabling quiz data export to JSON and restoration from a selected file, with confirmation dialog and status feedback.
frontend/src/quiz/blockUtils.ts: Utility functions for dividing questions into 100‑question blocks and labeling or slicing them.
frontend/src/quiz/draftStorage.ts: Saves, loads, and clears quiz drafts in localStorage with versioning and question serialization.
frontend/src/quiz/imageUtils.ts: Helpers for validating JPEGs, converting files to bytes, generating preview URLs, and creating ExternalBlobs.
frontend/src/quiz/PreGameQuestionCountVi: Renders a selector for choosing the number of quiz questions before starting, including loading and insufficient-questions states.
frontend/src/quiz/PreQuizSummaryView.tsx: Displays a summary of selected block and question count before starting a quiz, with validation and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/quiz/QuestionImagePicker.ts: Allows attaching, previewing, uploading, and removing JPG images for a question with size checks and progress feedback.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Large editor component for creating, editing, validating, restoring, and exporting quiz questions with extensive UI controls and state handling.
frontend/src/quiz/quizFlowDiagnostics.ts: Development helpers for logging quiz flow transitions and actions based on a localStorage flag.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Controls the full quiz flow including block selection, question count, summary, adaptive scheduling, translation, and answering logic.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Shows final quiz score, correct/incorrect counts, and provides actions to replay, review mistakes, or return to editing.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizScoreBar.tsx: Fixed bottom bar displaying running score of correct versus answered questions.
frontend/src/quiz/randomSubset.ts: Generates randomized subsets of question indices using Fisher‑Yates shuffle.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Type definitions for tracking question performance and session state.
frontend/src/quiz/StudyArticleView.tsx: Generates and displays a study article for a question with loading, error handling, scrolling, and escape‑key navigation.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: UI panel showing all quizzes, their question counts, and warnings when the current quiz is empty.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re‑exports Question and QuizId types from the backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates quiz questions for required content, answer counts, and correct‑answer indices.
frontend/src/quiz/WrongAnswersReview.tsx: Displays a scrollable list of wrong answers with optional study actions and Escape-to-exit support.
frontend/src/quiz/wrongAnswerTypes.ts: Defines the WrongAnswerEntry type for wrong‑answer review features.
frontend/src/types/env.d.ts: Type declarations for Vite environment variables and optional window‑injected env metadata.
frontend/src/utils/actorConnectionInfo.t: Resolves backend connection info including host, network, and canister ID using sync or async resolution paths.
frontend/src/utils/buildStamp.ts: Generates and caches build metadata using build-time and runtime env values with a stable build identifier.
Resolves the backend canister ID from multiple prioritized sources with tracking and detailed error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Collects, stores, and formats diagnostic errors with connection metadata for deployment troubleshooting.
frontend/src/utils/formatPublishChecklis: Builds a detailed text checklist for publishing, including build info, canister resolution, and step-by-step instructions.
frontend/src/utils/liveReadiness.ts: Evaluates deployment readiness based on canister ID resolution and backend health check results.
frontend/src/utils/quizExport.ts: Exports quiz data to a timestamped JSON file and triggers a browser download.
Performs a hard refresh by clearing app storage, unregistering service workers, clearing caches, and reloading with cache-busting.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeEnvStatus.ts: Inspects window.__ENV__ and /env.json accessibility to report configuration status and troubleshooting steps.
frontend/src/utils/shareLiveVerification: Generates a detailed text report combining build info, env status, canister resolution, network config, and health checks.
frontend/src/utils/stateSnapshotJson.ts: Serializes and deserializes StateSnapshot objects, handling ExternalBlob URL conversion and basic validation.
frontend/src/utils/stoppedCanisterDetect: Detects IC0508 stopped-canister errors, extracts canister IDs, formats messages, and provides recovery steps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query, hash, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the need to replace placeholder study articles with generated and persisted real content.
